mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MID, TO_CHAR(SCREENTIME, 'YYYY') AS year, TO_CHAR(SCREENTIME, 'MM') AS month, TO_CHAR(SCREENTIME, 'DD') AS day FROM P_SCREENDATE WHERE MID = #{mid}

SELECT DISTINCT ps.MID, ps.SCREENNO, pm."TYPE" , TO_CHAR(ps.SCREENTIME, 'YYYY') AS year, TO_CHAR(ps.SCREENTIME, 'MM') AS month, TO_CHAR(ps.SCREENTIME, 'DD') AS day, TO_CHAR(ps.SCREENTIME, 'HH') AS hour, TO_CHAR(ps.SCREENTIME, 'MI') AS minute FROM P_SCREENDATE ps JOIN P_MOVIE pm ON ps.MID = pm.MID WHERE ps.MID = #{mid} AND TO_CHAR(ps.SCREENTIME, 'MM') = #{mm} AND TO_CHAR(ps.SCREENTIME, 'DD') = #{dd}
